publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2612 Mr Lloyd Quinan: Congratulations to Pat Cox MEP-That the Parliament congratulates Pat Cox MEP on his election as President of the European Parliament; further congratulates the members of the European Parliament on electing a President from Ireland, and looks forward to a positive relationship between the Scottish Parliament and the European Parliament.
S1M-2612 Congratulations to Pat Cox MEP (lodged on 15 January 2002) Michael Matheson*, Colin Campbell*
S1M-2612 Congratulations to Pat Cox MEP (lodged on 15 January 2002) Alex Neil*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Donald Gorrie*

S1M-2612 Mr Lloyd Quinan: Congratulations to Pat Cox MEP-That the Parliament congratulates Pat Cox MEP on his election as President of the European Parliament; further congratulates the members of the European Parliament on electing a President from Ireland,and looks forward to a positive relationship between the Scottish Parliament and the European Parliament. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Colin Campbell, Alex Neil, Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Donald Gorrie
S1M-2612 Congratulations to Pat Cox MEP (lodged on 15 January 2002) Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-2612 Congratulations to Pat Cox MEP (lodged on 15 January 2002) Iain Smith*
S1M-2612 Congratulations to Pat Cox MEP (lodged on 15 January 2002) Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2612 Congratulations to Pat Cox MEP (lodged on 15 January 2002) Robert Brown*
S1M-2612 Congratulations to Pat Cox MEP (lodged on 15 January 2002) Richard Lochhead*
S1M-2612 Congratulations to Pat Cox MEP (lodged on 15 January 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
